Package application.routing.heuristic

Interface RoutingHeuristic

All Known Implementing Classes:
DistanceHeuristic, SimplePollutionHeuristic
public interface RoutingHeuristic
An interface used to specify routing heuristics.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  RoutingHeuristic.HeuristicEntry
    Data class used to store data to calculate a heuristic value associated with that data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double calculateCost​(RoutingHeuristic.HeuristicEntry entry)
    Calculates a the heuristic value of a path on the given entry.
    double calculateCost​(RoutingHeuristic.HeuristicEntry entry, long startTime)
    Calculates a heuristic value based on the given entry for a given time
    double calculateCostBetweenTwoNeighbours​(org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition begin, org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition end)
    Function to calculate the accumulated cost for a connection given its begin - and and end point
    double calculateCostConnection​(Connection connection, GraphStructure graph)
    Function to calculate the accumulated of a connection

  • Method Details

    • calculateCost

      double calculateCost​(RoutingHeuristic.HeuristicEntry entry)
      Calculates a the heuristic value of a path on the given entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry for the heuristic function on which the heuristic value is calculated.
      Returns:
      A double according to the heuristic (the lower the better).

    • calculateCostConnection

      double calculateCostConnection​(Connection connection, GraphStructure graph)
      Function to calculate the accumulated of a connection
      Parameters:
      connection - connection to calculate the heuristic value of
      graph - graph for getting begin and end point of a connection
      Returns:
      A double according to the heuristic (the lower the better) of the connection.

    • calculateCostBetweenTwoNeighbours

      double calculateCostBetweenTwoNeighbours​(org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition begin, org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition end)
      Function to calculate the accumulated cost for a connection given its begin - and and end point
      Parameters:
      begin - begin point of the connection
      end - end point of the connection
      Returns:
      A double according to the heuristic (the lower the better) of the connection.

    • calculateCost

      double calculateCost​(RoutingHeuristic.HeuristicEntry entry, long startTime)
      Calculates a heuristic value based on the given entry for a given time
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry for the heuristic function on which the heuristic value is calculated.
      startTime - the time upon which we calculate the heuristic value on the given entry
      Returns:
      A double according to the heuristic (the lower the better).
